      • addWeapon

        public void addWeapon​(java.lang.String categoryName,
                      java.lang.String weaponName,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      int inner,
                      int outer)
        Add a weapon to the munitions map
        Parameters:
        categoryName - Weapon category name
        weaponName - Weapon name
        description - Description
        inner - Inner (prone) radius
        outer - Outer (standing) radius

      • removeWeapon

        public boolean removeWeapon​(java.lang.String categoryName,
                            java.lang.String weaponName)
        Remove a weapon from the munitions map This method will also remove the category map if it's empty
        Parameters:
        categoryName - Category name
        weaponName - Weapon name
        Returns:
        True if the weapon was removed, false if it didn't exist
